extends java.lang.Object
    Date created: 1 May 2008 Last modified: 7 September 2008
    Author:
    Lama Akeila, Wafaa Humadi Purpose: The implementation of the Bookkepping mechanism.. It keeps track of the colours of the nodes during the runtime of the graph algorithm

      • removeIfNotTaken

        public boolean removeIfNotTaken(java.lang.Object o)
        This method test if the current vertex is taken or not. It returns false if its taken * and returns true and mark it as taken (removes it form the list) otherwise
